Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.filter

Interfaces for defining filters for data sources made available by connectors.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IConjunction
    Defines a logical criteria set, where criteria are combined together using a logical AND, associated with a cell structure.
    IDisjunction
    Defines a logical criteria set, where criteria are combined together using a logical OR, associated with a cell structure.
    IFilter
    Defines filtering parameters for a data source provided by a connector.
    IFilterBuilder
    Builds filters that can be applied to lists fetched from a connector data source.
    ILogicCriteria
    Base interface for defining a logical criteria set, associated with a cell structure.
    ILogicFilter
    Filter for connector data source lists, based on boolean algebra logic.
    ISearchFilter
    Filter for connector data source lists, based on full-text search.

Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.filter Description

Interfaces for defining filters for data sources made available by connectors.

Filters apply to data sources. The main methods for working with filters are:

  • IListStructure.buildFilter()
  • IFetchable.fetchList(fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth.ITicket, fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.filter.IFilter, fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.sort.ISort, fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.views.IRange)
  • IFetchable.fetchCount(fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth.ITicket, fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.filter.IFilter)
Since:
1.0
